original_title: Liverpool As Seen from the Front of an Electric Car from the Pierhead to the Circus
overview: Filmed from the front of a tram, this is a fine example of the popular early film form known as a 'phantom ride', shot from a moving vehicle to give the audience a virtual journey. Heading from the Pier Head (where the iconic 'Three Graces' had yet to be built), towards the commercial centre of Liverpool, we pass by smartly-dressed city folk - many of whom look towards the camera in fascination.
title: Liverpool As Seen from the Front of an Electric Car from the Pierhead to the Circus
